name: They Are Out There
description:
Explore the cosmos and build & defend your space station against huge waves of Lovecraftian style monsters.

Still lots more updates to come, any suggestions/bugs please let me know in a review down below :)

Controls:

Right Mouse Button - Thrusters

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

F - Shoot flare

T - Place Picked Up Turret

Space - Shockwave

When in space station:

Tab - Enter/Exit Space Station

Left Mouse Button/Drag - select turret & place turret
